data.actual_result: The text is squeezing against the left side of the modal. (will have pic)
data.expected_result: There should be some space between the left end of the modal (for text area) and the text.
data.short_description: Text is squeezing against the left side of the modal.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on Canary 16032 (or higher if the bug still exists then) - Go to a channel where you DO NOT have permission to write. - Observe carefully.
